activities.loc: Branch 1, Calumet County Courthouse, West Entrance

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

ADDRESS INFO for John C. Mueller
Current: 203 W. Sunny Lane Rd, Residential Services Unit A, Janesville, WI 53546 United States  (Effective: 09-26-2022)
Prior: 620 South Memorial Dr., Appleton, WI 54911

943.38(2) - Forgery-Uttering, PTAC (2 COUNTS)
943.82(1) - Fraud Against Financial Institution, PTAC
943.203(2)(a) - Identity Theft-Obtain Money or Credit, PTAC (2 COUNTS)

Shall not have contact with Horicon State Bank, Verve Credit Union, Quent's Service Center, Mark Gerlach, Kurt Johnson, and Lake View Auto Center & Sales.  No contact means no contact in person, in writing, by phone, computer, through a third person or otherwise, except through the defendant's attorney. 
Shall not possess any identifying information besides information for himself. 
Shall not leave state of Wisconsin without permission of the Court. 
Shall not apply for a passport while case is pending.

Defendant appears by phone from Outagamie County Jail,
Advised of charges & max penalties,
Advised of right to legal counsel,
$2,500 Signature Bond ordered.
